src_original: śraddhā vīrya smṛtiḥ samādhiḥ prajñā ca //

yat śraddhendriyeṇa satyeṣu abhisaṃpratyayasamutthānaṃ prayogabhāvanā /  vīryendriyeṇa satyeṣu utpannābhisaṃpratyayasyābhisaṃbodhyarthaṃ vyāyāmasamutthānaprayogabhāvanā /  smṛtīndriyeṇa satyeṣu ārabdhavīryasya smṛtisaṃprayogā dharmasaṃmopasamutthānaprayogabhāvanā /  samādhīndriyeṇa satyeṣu saṃprayukta smṛteḥ cittaikāgratāsamutthānaprayogabhāvanā /  prajñendriyeṇa satyeṣu samāhitacittasya pravicayasamutthānaprayogabhāvanā /  sapta bodhyaṅgānāmālambanaṃ katamat /  caturṇāmāryasatyānāṃ yathābhūtatā /
svabhāvaḥ katamaḥ /  śraddhā vīrya smṛtiḥ samādhiḥ prajñā ca //  sahāya katamaḥ /  tatsaṃprayuktāścittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //  bhāvanā katamā /
smṛtiḥ dharmavicayaḥ vīryaṃ prītiḥ praśrabdhiḥ samādhiḥ upekṣā ca //
tgt_original: དྲན་པ་དང་། ཆོས་རྣམ་པར་འབྱེད་པ་དང་། བརྩོན་འགྲུས་དང་། དགའ་བ་དང་། ཤིན་ཏུ་སྦྱངས་པ་དང་། ཏིང་ངེ་འཛིན་དང་། བཏང་སྙོམས་སོ་༎

src_original: dharmavicayaḥ svabhāvāṅgam /  vīryaṃ niryāṇāṅgam /  prītiḥ anuśaṃsāṅgam /
samyagvākkarmāntājīvāḥ parasaṃpratyapāṅgam /  darśanaśīlājīvaviśuddhitāmupādāya /  samyagvyāyāmaḥ kleśāvaraṇaviśodhanāṅgam /  samyaksamādhiḥ vaiśeṣikaguṇāvaraṇa viśodhanāṅgam //
kathaṃ vyavadānataḥ /  śuddhakā dhyānārūpyāḥ kuśalatvād vyavadātā ityucyante //
